doc:
Thomas G. Lingham https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_G._Lingham 0 Thomas G. Lingham (April 7, 1874 – February 19, 1950) was an American actor of the silent era. He appeared in 100 films between 1914 and 1934. He was born in Indianapolis, Indiana, and died in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles. He was the son of Katherine "Kate Fletcher" Lingham and Martin V. Lingham, who were also actors during the Stock Company days. He was married to Katherine Goodrich, also an actress. Thomas_G._Lingham ( April_7_,_1874 – February_19_,_1950 ) was an_American_actor of the_silent_era . He appeared in 100_films between 1914_and_1934 . He was_born in Indianapolis , Indiana , and died in Woodland_Hills , Los_Angeles . He was the_son of Katherine " Kate_Fletcher_"_Lingham and Martin_V._Lingham , who were also actors during the_Stock_Company_days . He was_married to Katherine_Goodrich , also an_actress .
